body.name: Iconikal Anti-Colic Vented Baby Feeding Bottle, 4-Ounce, 3-Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 19 mins
features: Help prevent colic and latching issues in your newborn with these vented bottles from Iconikal!
These anti-colic bottles have vented bases that allow air to flow through the bottom while feeding, reducing the chance for your baby to ingest air while feeding
Super-soft orthodontic bottle nipples feel natural and help your baby to latch for easier, less stressful feeding
These bottles are easy to clean without the need for bulky sterilization kits
Includes (3) 4-ounce bottles; compatible with MAM replacement nipples

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Clean before first and each subsequent use. Capable of self-sterilization in the microwave: Pour 1 ounce of water into base with silicone valve of bottle. Place the nipple with screw ring in the base. Screw body of the bottle onto the base with nipple inside. Place the cap on the top. Microwave for time indicated on instructions. Allow to cool before removing from the microwave.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Less Stress, More Snuggles Parenting an infant is difficult, but Iconikal is here to help with our 4oz anti-colic baby bottles. Our vented bottles with natural-feeling nipples help babies latch properly and promote proper airflow while feeding to help prevent colic. Help your baby get the nutrition they need without upsetting their delicate tummy for a less stressful feeding. Less colic means more rest for you and your baby.

Quality For Less At Iconikal, we believe in bringing our customers quality products for every budget. Why spend more on the big brands when you can get just what you're looking for without breaking the bank? Be good to your family and your wallet! Whatever you do, do it with Iconikal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way cheaper than ordering elsewhere!
reviews.reviewText: Love that EACH bottle came with a paci. Now my son has alot of paci so I don't have to buy any! Bottles I love that they self sterilize in the microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received one of this as a completion gift from my registry and it was great fit for feeding my son who is exclusively bf. I had to come back and order more and they are the perfect serving size for him while I’m at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comes with 3 bottles and 3 pacifiers for the price extremely good deal bottles work perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted smaller bottles for the newborn stage that came with the newborn nipples. This was perfect. I swear by the MAM bottles. Each bottle came with a pacifier too and now I have enough pacifier’s because we all know those love to disappear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing deal, great quality
reviews.reviewText: Awesome price for 3 bottles and 3 pacifiers! My baby loves these bottles, they’re the only ones she will take. Easy to wash and the bottle flow isn’t too fast for breastfeeding babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these bottles!
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to discover these are MAM bottles! We used MAM with our first baby and we prefer them over all the other brands. Each bottle also contained a paci inside! I am equally as excited about that because my first baby wasn’t huge on pacis so I don’t want to purchase many right now until we know if this baby will take one or not. Would highly recommend purchasing these items!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice it's a good buy for the money
reviews.reviewText: They really do work. My Goddaughter was spitting up a lot. So I order these bottles and I didn't realize it came with 3 pacifier and she loves them better than the one that the hospital gave her it was to long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE: got replacement
reviews.reviewText: No pacifiers, level 2 nipples and one level 1, and came with dried milk in it.. so it’s already been used. GrossUpdate:First pic is the first order, I think someone returned their used ones because they weren’t level 0 nipples and no pacifiers and they weren’t individually wrapped. Got replacement sent and they came perfect. Wrapped, level 0, pacifiers and mam papers inside bottles. Great deal and nice customer service on the companies end, emailed them about it.
